1370: Gheldekin moved to Cromme straet.B.7 after marriage.
Got married to Amalburga at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Amalburga, Marie, at age 21.
Lost daughter Marie when Marie was 1 years old.
1371: Had a son with Amalburga, Thomas, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Amalburga, Lielde, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Amalburga, Pauels, at age 27.
1377: Had a daughter with Amalburga, Heilsota, at age 28.
1381: Had a son with Amalburga, Ysaac, at age 32.
1386: Lost his wife Amalburga while she was giving birth to Reymodis in 1386.
1391: Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 6 years old.
